Package com.hotelapplication.backend

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hotelapplication.backend.User
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Manager
    public class User
extends Object
    Represents a user in the hotel reservation system. This class stores user details such as name, birthday, account information, and reservations. It provides methods to manage user details and reservations.
    Author:
    Alexander Boutselis

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User​(String firstName,
            String lastName,
            Calendar birthday,
            String username,
            String password)
        Constructs a User object with basic account details.
        Parameters:
        firstName - The user's first name.
        lastName - The user's last name.
        birthday - The user's date of birth.
        username - The username for the account.
        password - The password for the account.

      • User

        public User​(Integer userID,
            String firstName,
            String lastName,
            Calendar birthday,
            String username,
            String password,
            boolean isActive)
        Constructs a User object with detailed account and status information.
        Parameters:
        userID - The unique ID of the user.
        firstName - The user's first name.
        lastName - The user's last name.
        birthday - The user's date of birth.
        username - The username for the account.
        password - The password for the account.
        isActive - The active status of the account.

      • getReservationNumber

        public int getReservationNumber​(int searchReservationNumber)
        Retrieves a reservation number from the user's list of reservation numbers. This method searches for a reservation number in the list of the user's reservations and returns the first match found. If no reservation number is found, it returns -1.
        Parameters:
        searchReservationNumber - The reservation number to search for.
        Returns:
        The found reservation number, or -1 if no match is found.

      • getAllreservationNumbers

        public ArrayList<Integer> getAllreservationNumbers()
        Retrieves all reservation numbers associated with the user. This method returns the entire list of reservation numbers that belong to the user. It can be used to get a list of all reservations made by the user.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of reservation numbers.

      • addReservation

        public void addReservation​(int reservationNumber)
        Adds a reservation number to the user's list of reservations.
        Parameters:
        reservationNumber - The reservation number to add.

      • removeReservation

        public void removeReservation​(int reservationNumber)
        Removes a reservation number from the user's list of reservations.
        Parameters:
        reservationNumber - The reservation number to remove.

      • isEqualTo

        public boolean isEqualTo​(User otherUser)
        Checks if the current user is equal to another user based on their usernames.
        Parameters:
        otherUser - The other User object to compare.
        Returns:
        True if the usernames are equal; false otherwise.

      • setActiveStatus

        public void setActiveStatus​(boolean newStatus)
        Sets the user's active status.
        Parameters:
        newStatus - The active status to assign.

      • getActiveStatus

        public boolean getActiveStatus()
        Retrieves the user's active status.
        Returns:
        True if the user is active; false otherwise.
